nodes.text: Koozebane was a planet located in the Outer Rim Territories.
It was visited by Luke Skywalker, C-3PO, R2-D2 and Chewbacca, who together fought against a Sith Lord on the planet.

This planet first appeared in The Muppets Valentine Show, a predecessor to The Muppet Show which aired in 1974. Koozebane appeared frequently in sketches involving humorously strange aliens, most notably the Koozebanians and their bizarre mating ritual. It was later referenced in the Star Wars Insider articles Caravan of Courage: Star Wars on Television and Star Wars on The Muppet Show, and confirmed as a part of Star Wars Legends in 2009's The Essential Atlas.
